name: Super Man
catchphrase: I'm here to fight for truth, and justice, and the American way. - Super Man

name: Wonder Woman
catchphrase: I will fight for those who cannot fight for themselves. - Wonder Woman

name: Wolverine
catchphrase: You know, sometimes when you cage the beast, the beast gets angry. - Wolverine

name: Shaggy
catchphrase: I can already taste those chocolate-covered hotdogs. - Shaggy

name: Thor
catchphrase: Our ancestors called it magic but you call it science. I come from a land where they are one and the same.  - Thor

name: Black Widow
catchphrase: I'm always picking up after you boys. - Black Widow

name: Mr. Incredible
catchphrase: No matter how many times you save the world, it always manages to get back in jeopardy again. - Mr. Incredible
